title: Man-At-Arms

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a target to Bolster. They gain a basic auto-vest and heal 1 stress. 3 uses.
- At night, choose a player with a vest to Command. Take away their vest and roleblock them tonight. Regain a use of Bolster if you succeed in taking away their vest.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not stack vests on players that already have one.
- RB/Control immune against players you are Commanding.
- Taking away a player's vest happens before attacks do.
